name: Lust Selection : Episode Two
detailed_description:
Episode Two
The episode continues from where episode one left off as James attempts to tackle Hakim's problems that is greatly affecting his performance in the office. What exactly is happening in Hakim's personal life that has triggered such a change in him? What roles will James and Sandy play in order to get him out of this predicament?

As for Sylvia, what choices will you make when you witness an even more... intense encounter with her? Things might not be what it seems as you start to discover that even the Ice Queen can be trapped in a challenging situation.

This is the chapter that will make or break a character, a chapter where choices will shape the flow for the rest of the game, where things will start to get dark or darker depending on player's choices.

First you make your choices, and then your choices make you. Your adventure in the office continues here.

I hope you are ready.

short_description: The Second Chapter of The Corporate Saga.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz and above
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows-based sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHZ and Above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows-based sound card

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains adult themes and content that are not suitable for minors below the age of 18. These themes include nudity, strong language, alcohol, drug use, sex, and violence. All scenes are uncensored.
